title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List not Persisted Between Sessions (1GE71Z0)
description: The MRU (Most Recently Used) File List is not persisting between sessions.
OB: Upon restarting the application, the File menu MRU list does not display any files that were previously accessed in the last session.
EB: The MRU File List should persist between sessions, displaying the most recently accessed files in the File menu upon restarting the application.
SR:
1. Open the application and access multiple files from different locations.
2. Close the application.
3. Reopen the application and check the File menu MRU list to ensure that the previously accessed files are still listed.
